text1: Universal Shipping and Logistics is a unionized group of independent owner-operator captains maintaining rugged fleets of trade and commerce ships. USL facilities can be found on almost every co-operating planet and station, and are open to all licensed USL captains. From the time of the first traders, to trains, boats, and now spaceships, USL immortalizes the idea that for any road you take, there is a Right way, and a Wrong way.
